message: I'm feeling generous, Bob. Let's split it 90/10, with you getting the smaller share. This way, we both get something, and we can end this game quickly.
I'm not impressed with your first offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to be too generous!
Okay, Bob, I'm getting a bit tired of this game. Let's split the money 60/40. I'm willing to give you more, but if you reject this, the next round will be even less appealing for you.
You're getting desperate, Alice! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting off that easily. This is my best offer so far, and it's not going to get any better.
